title: Everyday English Course 91
description: Improve your English comprehension skills through short everyday conversations and situational dialogues.

sections.title: Section 1: English Practice
sections.description: Learn to understand and respond to basic English dialogues used in daily situations.

variables.a: What color does the man like?
Does the woman like tea?

questionTemplates.text:
M: What can I do for you, Madam?
W: Can I get a city map at the hotel?
M: Yes, there is a newspaper stall downstairs where they have the city map. Shall I get one for you?
W: No, thanks. We can get one when we go downstairs.
{a}

variables.a: What has the man done to help?

questionTemplates.text:
W: Sunshine Rentals. How can I help you?
M: I need a car to go to Florida, on May 13th.
W: Certainly sir. What kind of car would you like?
M: An SUV, I think. I'm travelling with my wife and three kids.
{a}

variables.a: What are the speakers mainly talking about?
How long can the woman keep the book?

questionTemplates.text:
M: Shall we take a bus or the underground?
W: The stop is a bit far and I'm too tired to walk. I want to get a taxi home.
M: All right.
{a}

variables.a: How are they going home?
How many blocks will the woman have to travel?
When should the man place his call to Houston?
What are the two speakers talking about?

questionTemplates.text:
M: Hello, Sue. When are you taking off?
W: Tomorrow morning, from Beijing. The plane takes off at 5:00, and if everything goes well, I'll be at the hotel by 10:00.
M: I can't travel this year because I must finish my work by the end of September.
{a}

variables.a: When is the woman leaving?

variables.a: What had the woman thought before?

questionTemplates.text:
W: I have a stomachache. I think I got some bad food at lunch today.
M: Really? But we ate together. How come my stomach is fine?
W: You have an iron stomach! Mine is not that strong.
M: So what should we do now?
W: I've got to find .... Ah, be quick! I think I've got the runs.
{a}

variables.a: What is the woman supposed to find quickly?

answerOptions: To see a movie and write a comment.
instances.correctAnswer: To see a movie and write a comment.
